
model Person {
    fields {
        name Text
        favouriteThing Thing
    }
}

model Thing {
    fields {
        description Text
    }
}

===

model Person {
    fields {
        name Text
    }
}

model Thing {
    fields {
        description Text
    }
}


===

ALTER TABLE "person" DROP COLUMN "favourite_thing_id";

=== 

[
  { "Model": "Person", "Field": "favouriteThingId", "Type": "REMOVED" }
]
